projects.title: Twitter Showcase App
description: Developed a mock Twitter search app with React and Flask.
Processed API data in real time with error handling.
Enhanced backend skills with Flask and multi-language integration.
Showcased seamless technology integration for functionality.

projects.title: Chat App
description: Built a real-time chat app inspired by Slack using React & Socket.IO.
Created a secure backend with Flask, SQL, and JWT authentication.
Implemented web sockets for live, multi-user messaging.
Designed a responsive UI with Bootstrap.
